item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "CLARE: The library is cool and smells like carpet cleaner, although all I can see is marble. " -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by A.A. Milne
Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Clive Barker
item.description:
"I dreamed I spoke in another's language, I dreamed I lived in another's skin, I dreamed I was my own beloved, I dreamed I was a tiger's kin.
I dreamed that Eden lived inside me, And when I breathed a garden came, I dreamed I knew all of Creation, I dreamed I knew the Creator's name.
I dreamed--and this dream was the finest-- That all I dreamed was real and true, And we would live in joy forever, You in me, and me in you." -- Clive Barker

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Science and religion are not at odds. Science is simply too young to understand." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Orang boleh pandai setinggi langit, tapi selama ia tidak menulis, ia akan hilang di dalam masyarakat dan dari sejarah. Menulis adalah bekerja untuk keabadian." -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by pramoedya ananta toer
item.description: "Dalam hidup kita, cuma satu yang kita punya, yaitu keberanian. Kalau tidak punya itu, lantas apa harga hidup kita ini?" -- pramoedya ananta toer

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Pramoedya Ananta Toer
item.description: "Dan alangkah indah kehidupan tanpa merangkak-rangkak di hadapan orang lain" -- Pramoedya Ananta Toer

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Natasha Friend
item.description: "When you believe in something, stand up for it, even if everyone is sitting." -- Natasha Friend

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Google' is not a synonym for 'research'." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Just when you think it can't get any worse, it can. And just when you think it can't get any better, it can." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Tolstoy Leo
item.description: "If you want to be happy, be." -- Tolstoy Leo

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by John Wood
item.description: "Sometimes, it's really important to move with all deliberate speed. If there is something out there that you want to do to make the world a better place, don't focus on the obstacles. Don't ask for permission. Just dive in. Don't let the naysayers get you down." -- John Wood

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "... see how everything now is precious, how someday I'll know I was lucky to be here." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "I guess it’s always romantic when two people fall in love.... Even if it turns out not to be real." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Sometimes, you read a book and it fills you with this weird evangelical zeal, and you become convinced that the shattered world will never be put back together unless and until all living humans read the book." -- John Green

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "When it comes to passion, I'm not sure you have any choice but to follow." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "So many people live within unhappy circumstances and yet will not take the initiative to change their situation because they are conditioned to a life of security, conformity, and conservatism, all of which may appear to give one peace of mind, but in reality nothing is more dangerous to the adventurous spirit within a man than a secure future. The very basic core of a man’s living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun." -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Robert Penn Warren
item.description: "Tell me a story of deep delight." -- Robert Penn Warren

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Seth Godin
item.description: "Rich is my word for someone who can afford to make choices, who has enough resources to do more than merely survive." -- Seth Godin

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Paul Auster
item.description: "Reading was my escape and my comfort, my consolation, my stimulant of choice: reading for the pure pleasure of it, for the beautiful stillness that surrounds you when you hear an author's words reverberating in your head." -- Paul Auster

item.title: Sandra (Page by Page) add a quote by Rick Riordan
item.description: "Families are messy. Immortal families are eternally messy. Sometimes the best we can do is to remind each other that we're related for better or for worse...and try to keep the maiming and killing to a minimum." -- Rick Riordan
